column1: Wearing masks can help reduce the spread of coronavirus, but the practice has led to a new complaint — “maskne,” breakouts caused by wearing a mask for long periods of time. https://billingsgazette.com/lifestyles/health-med-fit/how-to-prevent-maskne-and-other-face-mask-skin-issues-according-to-dermatologists/article_7fa2a32c-b189-5c25-a88e-76deaa587966.html?utm_campaign=snd-autopilot&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter_billingsgazette
